WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
Could someone replace all "var" in source code with appropriate public or private, beacause my syntax checker complains about var, that is deprecated in PHP 5, and should be renamed to public/private.
 
Here is the list of files containing "var":
PHPExcel/Shared/JAMA/examples/benchmark.php
PHPExcel/PHPExcel/Shared/JAMA/examples/Stats.php
PHPExcel/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel5/Worksheet.php
PHPExcel/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel5/Parser.php
PHPExcel/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel5/Workbook.php
PHPExcel/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel5/Xf.php
PHPExcel/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel5/BIFFwriter.php
 
Thanks,
Dean

Comments.Message: Changing them all to public so we are sure nothing will break.
